item.title: Showertrack!
item.description: So much projects, so little time... But hey, let's just use some of my spare time for keeping you guys updated on the stuff I do. I've been doing several things, but the most interesting right now is a new iPhone app concept that we've been developing since last month. Together with Nils Waanders and Willemijn Edens we are creating an app which helps people save water while showering. It's called Showertrack.
